      • updateCampaign

        public CampaignResponse updateCampaign(java.lang.String campaignId,
                              Campaign campaign)
                                throws RouteeAuthenticationException,
                                       java.io.IOException,
                                       RouteeMessagingException
        This method is used to Update an already scheduled campaign. You can change the recipients or the sender id or any other parameter you set previously. Note that the campaign must have status "Scheduled" in order to update it.
        Parameters:
        campaignId - the campaign’s tracking id.
        campaign - the campaign
        Returns:
        the campaign response
        Throws:
        RouteeAuthenticationException - the routee authentication exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        RouteeMessagingException - the routee messaging exception

        public SingleSmsTrackResponse trackSingleSms(java.lang.String messageId)
                                      throws RouteeAuthenticationException,
                                             java.io.IOException,
                                             RouteeMessagingException
        This method is used when you want to get all the tracking information for the messages (parts) of a single SMS by providing its message id.
        Parameters:
        messageId - The id of the single SMS
        Returns:
        the single sms track response
        Throws:
        RouteeAuthenticationException - the routee authentication exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        RouteeMessagingException - the routee messaging exception

      • trackMultipleSmsOfSpecificCampaign

        public TrackMultipleSmsResponse trackMultipleSmsOfSpecificCampaign(TrackMultipleSmsParamters parameters,
                                                          java.lang.String CampaignID)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                   RouteeMessagingException,
                                                                   RouteeAuthenticationException
        This method is used to get all the tracking information for the messages of a campaign by providing the campaign tracking id.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the parameters
        CampaignID - The tracking id of the campaign which includes the messages.
        Returns:
        the track multiple sms response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        RouteeMessagingException - the routee messaging exception
        RouteeAuthenticationException - the routee authentication exception
